title: From John O'Groats to Land's End; Or, 1372 miles on foot; A book of days and chronicle of adventures by two pedestrians on tour
author: Naylor, John Anderton
snippet: The monument on the top of Whita Hill was erected in memory of one ofthe famous four Knights of Langholm, the sons of Malcolm of Burn Foot,whose Christian names were James, Pulteney, John, and Charles, all ofwhom became distinguished men.
